str2: A primary particle; properly, indicative of affirmation or concession; usually followed by a contrasted clause with de.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To pity, have mercy on. From eleos; to compassionate.

str2: From dia and krino; to separate thoroughly, i.e. to withdraw from, or oppose; figuratively, to discriminate, or hesitate.
